name: Multitalented Mastery
descriptionText: You are adept at numerous disciplines.
benefitText: All of your classes are considered favored classes. You gain either +1 hit point or +1 skill point whenever you take a level in any class. Apply these bonuses retroactively for all class levels that have not yet gained one of these bonuses.
normalText: Half-elves with the multitalented racial trait have two favored classes.
